articles.title: Lakers seething after missed call leads to loss vs. Celtics - ESPN Australia
articles.description: The Lakers felt "cheated" after the head referee in Saturday's OT loss to the Celtics admitted the crew missed a shouting foul by Jayson Tatum against LeBron James at the end of regulation.
